snippet.title: Minecraft Triple Bundle
snippet.description:
Step into a blocky universe of creativity, thrills, and mystery with three Minecraft games in one bundle. Explore and shape infinite, unique worlds in Minecraft, the ultimate sandbox game where you can survive the night or create a work of art – or both!  Team up with friends* or fight solo through action-packed and treasure-stuffed levels in Minecraft Dungeons. Forge alliances and fight in strategic battles to save the Overworld in Minecraft Legends. Want even more adventures? This bundle also includes 1020 Minecoins, which you can use to purchase exciting creator-made content for Minecraft: Bedrock Edition and Minecraft Legends.**
Read more: https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/store/minecraft-dungeons-legends-bundle
